title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that users can successfully log in using valid username/email and password combinations.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid username/email and password
Click login button
Confirm user is authenticated and redirected to main app shell

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that users cannot log in with invalid username/email or password and appropriate error is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid username/email or password
Click login button
Verify error message indicating invalid credentials is displayed

title: User Logout Functionality
description: Ensure user can successfully logout from the application and is redirected to login page.

steps.description: Login successfully
Click logout button/link
Verify user is unauthenticated and redirected to login page

title: Sidebar Navigation Accessibility
description: Verify the sidebar navigation is accessible from all main app screens and navigates correctly.

steps.description: Login and observe sidebar in main app shell
Click each navigation link in the sidebar
Verify corresponding page or section loads without errors

title: Responsive Layout on Various Screen Sizes
description: Validate the app shell including sidebar and layout adapts properly to different screen sizes (desktop, tablet, mobile).

steps.description: Access the application on desktop screen size
Verify sidebar and content layout render as expected
Resize browser or use device emulation to tablet size
Verify layout adjusts properly and remains usable
Resize browser or use device emulation to mobile size
Verify sidebar collapses or transforms for mobile and navigation remains functional

title: Deal Board Rendering and Data Accuracy
description: Verify that the Kanban-style Deal Board displays all deals categorized correctly by their status with accurate data.

steps.description: Login and navigate to Deal Board
Confirm all deals are loaded and displayed under correct status columns
Check each deal card shows key metadata correctly

title: Kanban Board Drag-and-Drop Deal Status Update
description: Test dragging and dropping deal cards between columns updates deal status and persists changes.

steps.description: Navigate to Deal Board with multiple deals
Drag a deal card from one status column to another
Confirm deal status updates visually in UI
Refresh or re-open app
Verify deal status change is persisted in backend and reflected in UI

title: Open Deal Detail View Displays Metadata and Timeline
description: Check that clicking a deal card opens Detail view showing all metadata fields and interaction timeline accurately.

steps.description: Go to Deal Board and select a deal card
Verify detail view modal or page opens
Check all metadata fields are correctly displayed without data inconsistency
Confirm timeline shows accurate interaction history and updates chronologically

title: New Deal Modal - Standard Mode Data Entry and Save
description: Verify creating a new deal via the modal in standard mode saves deal data correctly and updates Deal Board.

steps.description: Open New Deal Modal in standard mode
Fill all mandatory fields with valid data
Submit the deal creation form
Confirm new deal appears on Deal Board with correct data and initial status

title: New Deal Modal - Panic Mode Quick-Save
description: Validate the panic mode quick-save feature allows fast deal logging with minimal data and persists deal appropriately.

steps.description: Open New Deal Modal and select panic mode
Enter minimal required data for quick-save
Save deal quickly using panic mode
Verify deal is created with given data and visible on Deal Board

title: Brief Translator - AI-Powered Analysis Accuracy
description: Verify that the Brief Translator tool produces coherent and actionable risk and opportunity analysis on given brand briefs.

steps.description: Navigate to Brief Translator tool
Input a sample brand brief text for analysis
Trigger AI analysis
Confirm analysis results are displayed highlighting risks and opportunities relevant to input

title: Brief Translator - Handle Invalid or Empty Input
description: Ensure that Brief Translator handles empty or invalid input gracefully, showing appropriate error messages or prompts.

steps.description: Open Brief Translator tool
Submit empty input or invalid data
Verify user is prompted to enter valid brief text and no analysis is performed

title: Rate Checker Tool - Pricing Suggestion Accuracy
description: Confirm the Rate Checker calculates and returns relevant AI-driven optimal pricing suggestions based on provided deal parameters.

steps.description: Navigate to Rate Checker tool
Input valid deal parameters such as brand, deal type, duration, and scope
Request pricing suggestion from AI tool
Verify a consistent and reasonable pricing suggestion is presented

title: Rate Checker - Handle Missing or Invalid Parameters
description: Ensure the Rate Checker tool validates input parameters and displays errors for missing or invalid data.

steps.description: Open Rate Checker tool
Submit with missing or invalid parameters
Verify validation errors are shown and no pricing suggestion is provided

title: Global Data Management Consistency Across App Sections
description: Verify that global data such as user info, deal data, and authentication states remain consistent and synchronized when navigating between app sections.

steps.description: Login and load multiple sections: Deal Board, Deal Detail, Brief Translator, Rate Checker
Confirm user data and deal data remain consistent with no stale or conflicting state
Make updates in one section (e.g., update deal status)
Verify reflected updates appear correctly across other app sections without reload

title: Backend Integration - Supabase Data Storage Reliability
description: Test that all CRUD operations for deals and user data correctly interact with Supabase backend with proper success and failure handling.

steps.description: Create, update, and delete deals through UI
Verify changes persist in Supabase backend and UI updates accordingly
Simulate backend failure (e.g., network interruption)
Confirm appropriate error messages are shown and app handles failures gracefully

title: Backend Integration - Gemini AI Service Latency and Error Handling
description: Verify the app handles latency and errors from Gemini AI services for Brief Translator and Rate Checker without crashing or freezing.

steps.description: Use Brief Translator and Rate Checker tools under normal conditions
Confirm AI results return correctly
Simulate slow or failed Gemini AI responses
Verify app shows loading states appropriately and error messages if AI service is unavailable

title: Data Validation on Deal Creation Modal
description: Ensure the New Deal Modal validates user input fields correctly including required fields, data formats, and constraints before allowing submission.

steps.description: Open New Deal Modal in standard mode
Try submitting empty or invalid input data (e.g., invalid date format, missing required fields)
Verify form validation errors prevent submission and show clear messages
Input valid data and submit successfully
Confirm new deal created without validation errors
